headline: Trump's new tariffs on pharma, furniture, & trucks: What to know
summary: President Trump announced sweeping new tariffs on pharmaceuticals, heavy trucks, and furniture imports. The duty on pharmaceuticals sits at 100% for patented drugs unless the producer is building a manufacturing plant in the US. White House columnist for The Hill, Niall Stanage, and Yahoo Finance senior reporter Brooke DiPalma outline the details of the tariff policy and examine the respective market reactions. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
